title: Fate
description: I'm used to getting what I want. I've always taken what I wanted. No apologies. No excuses.I know what it feels like to be betrayed, when someone else is calling all the shots. I've been down that road, and I'm not going there again. I've got my family, my friends, and the brotherhood. That's all I need.I believe in Fate. Everything happens for a reason. But what do you do when Fate kicks you in the gut, plays a cruel joke on you?When I met Quincy Priest, she was a flame I couldn't put out. A freakin' wildfire. She blew in to my life, burned it to the ground, then left me standing in the ashes. Gone as suddenly as she came. I'm not sure if I should love her or hate herâ€¦ But I don't hate her. I could never hate her.What do you do when the person who broke you may be the only person who can put you back together?Can you run from Fate? Do you even want to?You've read Quincy's story... now, let me introduce you to Brody. Fate is the 2nd book in the Choices series. Either book can be read as stand alone. Fate is a new adult contemporary romance intended for audiences 18+.
author: Sydney Lane
